column4: I wish the webbrowser automaticly checked a md5sum of a downloaded file
No need to.  That mean every time you download something trivial such as images and torrent files, it'll be checked?  That's painful.
how is it painful? The user should have the option to enable this feature for specific files, such as .iso
It's not in our control.  There are movie ISOs.  DVD ISOs.  Softwares ISOs.  :)
